titleStmt.title: De termino Michaelis anno .xiiij. regni regis Edwardi quarti

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete within Temple Barre, at the signe of the Hand and Starre, by Rychard Tottel,

notesStmt.note: Law reports for 14 Edward IV (Michaelmas, Hilary, Easter, and Trinity terms).
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
